column4: hello, im trying install some pkg with aptitude, select pkg, press +, it shows red bar below with suggests, press 'e' - select first, see some unresolved, select first, in lower half of screen there are some variants: cancel installation, downgrade, etc, select what i need, press 'a' - 'apply solution', line becomes green, repeat it for all unresolved packages. now. hot to TOTALLY apply it?!
